hero.title: Art Forged by the Southern Ocean
hero.tagline: Hand‚Äëcollected sea glass and early 1900s pottery, shaped by storms, polished by the Southern Ocean, and reborn as timeless art and jewelry.

products.name: Sea Glass Jewelry
products.description: Wear a piece of the wild Tasmanian coast. Each shard of sea glass is a unique gem, shaped by the waves and set in sterling silver. A personal treasure that carries the story of the ocean.

products.name: Collector's Edition Framed Pottery
products.description: The soul of our collection. These framed tiles feature rare, hand-collected pottery fragments from the early 1900s. Each one is a preserved piece of history, making it a truly one-of-a-kind statement for your home.

products.name: Functional Sea Glass Coasters
products.description: Protect your surfaces with functional art. Our coasters bring the colors of the Tasmanian shoreline to your table. Perfect as a memorable gift or a daily reminder of the sea, they are our most popular conversation starter.

products.name: Southern Ocean Sea Glass Magnets
products.description: A small treasure, a perfect gift. These powerful magnets feature a hand-picked piece of genuine sea glass, offering a simple, beautiful way to bring a touch of the ocean into your kitchen or office.

brandStory.title: From Shipwreck to Shoreline
brandStory.content:
Every piece from Tasmanian Treasures begins its journey in the tempestuous Southern Ocean. For over a century, waves have churned and tumbled fragments of glass and discarded pottery from a bygone era.

We walk these remote shores after every storm, searching for the smoothest, most character-filled pieces. The blue and white patterns on our pottery tiles are remnants of daily life in the early 1900s, while our sea glass tells a story of resilience, transformed from sharp refuse into ocean-polished gems. We don‚Äôt alter their shape or color‚Äîwe simply give them a new purpose, preserving their wild history for you to cherish.

valuePropositions.title: Genuinely Tasmanian
valuePropositions.description: Every piece is hand-collected from the wild, remote beaches of Tasmania.

valuePropositions.title: A Piece of History
valuePropositions.description: Featuring authentic pottery shards dating back to the early 20th century.

valuePropositions.title: Sustainably Reborn
valuePropositions.description: We give discarded materials a second life as beautiful, lasting treasures.

reviews.quote: My framed pottery tile is the centerpiece of my living room. It's not just art; it's a beautiful piece of history. I love knowing the story behind it.
reviews.author: Chloe R., Sydney

reviews.quote: I bought a set of the sea glass coasters as a housewarming gift, and they were a huge hit! So unique and beautifully made. Far better than anything mass-produced.
reviews.author: Ben L., Portland

finalCta.title: Find Your Piece of the Southern Ocean
finalCta.content: Our collections are crafted in small batches based on what the tides reveal. Explore our current treasures and own a unique story shaped by the sea.
